rows.label: tlk502104_msg0002
rows.name:
I picked some grass! Now I'm going to
make a lovely grass crown!

rows.label: tlk502104_msg0004
rows.name:
You like trees and outdoor things like
that?

rows.label: tlk502104_msg0005
rows.name:
Yeah! I love 'em, and I like to play with
them! And you can find 'em anywhere,
so you can play anywhere!

rows.label: tlk502104_msg0007
rows.name:
Shall we make one each? Then we'd
be like sisters with matching crowns!

rows.label: tlk502104_msg0008
rows.name: Ah, no. I'll give it a miss.

rows.label: tlk502104_msg0011
rows.name:
OK... Well, I'll give you this anyway,
because we made friends today!

rows.label: tlk502104_msg0012
rows.name:
This is a really nice pendant.
Are you sure it's OK for me to have it?

rows.label: tlk502104_msg0013
rows.name:
Well, I dunno, but it's probably fine!
I got it from a nice mercenary lady,
myself, after all.

rows.label: tlk502104_msg0014
rows.name:
I'll be OK with the grass crown and a
grass bracelet!
